Html:
hi,

are there any issues setting up oxite on shared hosting? i noticed that their are several things that need to be installed..Will it work in medium trust?

thanks

Works fine in shared hosting.  Should work in Medium Trust though I know some people have had troubles getting it to work on GoDaddy.  I host on DiscountASP.NET and did absolutely nothing other than copy up the files to get Oxite running.
